alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 23 at 8:58PM MST until November 24 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu, Lake Mohave, Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert, Cadiz Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds will make driving difficult for motorcycles... large trucks...trailers and campers. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds over the open waters will make the lake water rough and hazardous...and may result in high waves which may tip or swamp smaller craft.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
